an11.2:1.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam silavato silasampannassa avippatisaro uppajjati.
an11.2:2.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam avippatisarissa pamojjam uppajjati.
an11.2:3.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam pamuditassa piti uppajjati.
an11.2:4.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam pitimanassa kayo passambhati.
an11.2:5.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam passaddhakayo sukham vediyati.
an11.2:6.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an11.2:7.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam samahito yathabhutam janati passati.
an11.2:8.1: Yathabhutam, bhikkhave, janato passato na cetanaya karaniyam:
an11.2:8.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam yathabhutam janam passam nibbindati.
an11.2:9.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam nibbinno virajjati.
an11.2:10.3: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yam viratto vimuttinanadassanam sacchikaroti.
an11.2:11.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, virago vimuttinanadassanattho vimuttinanadassananisamso, nibbida viragattha viraganisamsa, yathabhutananadassanam nibbidattham nibbidanisamsam, samadhi yathabhutananadassanattho yathabhutananadassananisamso, sukham samadhattham samadhanisamsam, passaddhi sukhattha sukhanisamsa, piti passaddhattha passaddhanisamsa, pamojjam pitattham pitanisamsam, avippatisaro pamojjattho pamojjanisamso, kusalani silani avippatisaratthani avippatisaranisamsani.
an11.2:11.2: Iti kho, bhikkhave, dhamma dhamme abhisandenti, dhamma dhamme paripurenti apara param gamanaya”ti.
